Come on, , I grew up trusting you to have all your facts in a row and to be reliable. Lately you have been destroying my expectations.

When are people going to realize that Hanukkah is NOT The Jewish Christmas! It's a completely different holiday, it has a completely different meaning! The only reason that Hanukkah is associated with Christmas is because it falls around Christmas time! So... Enough already!
Only toothpaste makers want you to believe that.

You can parse words however you want. It may have been an """"accident,"""" technically. But how convenient. There is no parsing """"dead."""" Dead is dead. This """"manslaughter 'accident'"""" should not have happened in the first place. Let's see if this cop takes responsibility for his commission of manslaughter and is held accountable. Too many cops are getting acquitted for this stuff, with not even a slap on the wrist.

I would have done the same thing. I had an amnio in 1989. If something had been wrong, I would have terminated the pregnancy. I did not want my older 2 kids to have to perhaps eventually have to take care of a child with disabilities because Mom decided to wear a """"badge of honor"""". Sorry, folks, but that's what a lot of you ladies sound like when putting down someone that made a personal decision to terminate a pregnancy. Like somehow, you are special and deserve some medal because you made YOUR personal decision to continue with your pregnancy and anything otherwise is wrong because you have determined it to be so. That decision to have your child is yours, just like it was her decision to terminate. Her decision did not affect you in any way, so why make it personal.
